name: Please, Don't Die (IVA1, TOFU)
description:
Theme:  Delay the inevitable

There is my submission to Ludum Dare 50. Enjoy!

Yellow is safe. Stay on Yellow to not Die. Please, Don't Die.

 Controls:

WASD - Movement

Hold Left Mouse Button - Fire

Right Mouse Button - Dash

Change Log: I fix a bug in yellow platform, that made this not move properly. (* Time.deltaTime)
